item.title: Anpcont - Open Data
item.dc:creator: Henrique C. Martins
item.description: Slides I used in the talk about open data in the Panel about “Ethics” at the Anpcont annual meeting 2022:

item.title: Talk With Marcelo Perlin
item.dc:creator: Henrique C. Martins
item.description: I am happy to share this talk I had with Marcelo Perlin and Gerson Junior about Perlin’s new package to download financial data from Brazilian Companies using R (GetDFPdata2).

item.title: Webinar about Investors Relations
item.dc:creator: Henrique C. Martins
item.description:
I am happy to share this talk I had with Luciana Ferreira and José Treiger about Investors Relations and Corporate Governance.

They will be teaching in a 100% digital course about this same topic. For more information, check here.

item.title: ESG with Conrad Albrecht (MSCI)
item.dc:creator: Henrique C. Martins
item.description:
Hey, I had the opportunity to talk about ESG with Conrad Albrecht. He is the Head of ESG & Business Development Latin America MSCI. We discussed ESG, PRI, and several topics related with the investment industry.

I hope you like it.

item.title: Open Science Seminar
item.dc:creator: Henrique C. Martins
item.description:
Hey, I had the opportunity to talk about Open Science in Management, Economics and Accounting Research. This is a seminar presented to the UFV Master students of economics.

You can download the slides clicking the button above. Thanks, Júlio for the invitation.

item.title: Café com ADM
item.dc:creator: Henrique C. Martins
item.description:
I am happy to share this talk I had with Café com ADM.

We discussed some effects of the pandemic on financial decisions. I hope you like it.
